ballastNoWeight.description: The weight of a ballast when redstone powered

ballastWeight.description: The weight of a ballast when not redstone powered

balloonAnalogStrength.description: How much stronger a balloon will get when powered (1.0 is 15x stronger at max power)

balloonPower.description: The force a balloon applies to a ship

blockBlacklist.description: The list of blocks that don't get assembled by the ship assembler

items.description: The list of blocks that don't get assembled by the ship assembler

chunkLoadTimeout.description: After how many ticks to error when loading chunk still not finished? (throws error when double this amount of ticks has passed)

chunkTicketsPerTick.description: How many chunk tickets can be processed each level tick? (-1 means unlimited)

chunksPerTicket.description: How many chunks can be loaded per chunk ticket?

propellerBigAccel.description: The acceleration of a big propeller. (deaccel = accel * 2)

propellerBigForce.description: The force of a big propeller at max speed

propellerBigSpeed.description: The max speed of a big propeller at max redstone input

propellerSmallAccel.description: The acceleration of a big propeller. (deaccel = accel * 2)

propellerSmallForce.description: The force of a big propeller at max speed

propellerSmallSpeed.description: The max speed of a big propeller at max redstone input

pulseGunForce.description: The force the pulse gun applies to a ship

removeAllAttachments.description: DO NOT CHANGE THIS UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING!

ropeMaxForce.description: The maximum force a rope can handle before breaking

sensorDistance.description: Maximum distance a sensor can detect a ship from

spinnerSpeed.description: The force a spinner applies to a ship

thrusterShutoffSpeed.description: The speed at which the thruster will stop applying force. (-1 means that it always applies force)

thrusterSpeed.description: The force a thruster applies to a ship * tier

thrusterTiersNormal.description: The maximum amount of tiers a normal thruster can have (1-5)

thrusterTiersTiny.description: The maximum amount of tiers a tiny thruster can have (1-5)

thrusterTinyForceMultiplier.description: The force multiplier of a tiny thruster

unpoweredBalloonMul.description: The force multiplier of a balloon (not for "powered balloon")
